intro: Gomphichis costaricensis, commonly known as the Costa Rican spiderwort, is a flowering plant native to Central America. It has lance-shaped leaves and produces small, clustered inflorescences. Gomphichis costaricensis is valued for its ornamental appeal and ecological importance in supporting local wildlife.
